titleStmt.title: A consolatory letter, humbly addressed to her royal highness the Princess Anne of Denmark, upon the much lamented death of his most illustrious highness William Duke of Gloucester, August 2. 1700

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2386 lacking all after page 48.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
